creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: small six-panel screen; various images of common people engaged in activities; a group of men and women engage in a tea house at R; men and women preparing food, with a man flaying red fish; woman walking with baby; other people walking, old woman near bottom walking with monkey on string; blossoming trees; clusters of bound grains; flecked metallic background
title: Genre scenes
